data.eml:eml: A review of the scorpionflies (Mecoptera) of Indochina with the description of a new species of Neopanorpa from Northern Thailand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bicha, Wesley J. (2010): A review of the scorpionflies (Mecoptera) of Indochina with the description of a new species of Neopanorpa from Northern Thailand. Zootaxa 2480: 61-67, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.294376
